SELECT DISTINCT t3.ID_ as id, t1.ID_ AS taskId, t1.NAME_ AS taskName, t2.NAME_ AS formName, t2.TENANT_ID_ AS tenantId, t2.BUSINESS_KEY_ AS businessKey, t2.PROC_INST_ID_ AS processInstanceId, t1.CREATE_TIME_ AS startTime, t3.CUSTOM_TASK_MAX_DAY_ as customTaskMaxDay, t3.TASK_MAX_DAY_ as taskMaxDay, t3.TASK_DEF_KEY_ as taskDefinitionKey, t3.PROC_DEF_ID_ as processDefinitionId, # t3.END_TIME_ as endTime, t3.ASSIGNEE_ as assignee, t3.TASK_REST_TIME_ as restTime, t3.GROUP_ID_ as groupId, t3.FLOW_TYPE_ as flowType FROM act_ru_task t1 LEFT JOIN act_ru_execution t2 ON t1.PROC_INST_ID_ = t2.PROC_INST_ID_ and t1.EXECUTION_ID_ = t2.ID_ LEFT JOIN act_ru_extension_task t3 ON T1.ID_ = t3.TASK_ID_ and t1.PROC_INST_ID_ = t3.PROC_INST_ID_ WHERE t2.PARENT_ID_ is not null and t3.ID_ is not null
and t1.PROC_INST_ID_ = #{processInstanceId}

SELECT DISTINCT t3.ID_ as id, t1.ID_ AS taskId, t1.NAME_ AS taskName, t1.START_TIME_ AS startTime, t3.CUSTOM_TASK_MAX_DAY_ as customTaskMaxDay, t3.TASK_MAX_DAY_ as taskMaxDay, t3.TASK_DEF_KEY_ as taskDefinitionKey, t3.PROC_DEF_ID_ as processDefinitionId, t1.ASSIGNEE_ as assignee, t3.TASK_REST_TIME_ as restTime, t3.GROUP_ID_ as groupId, t1.TENANT_ID_ AS tenantId, t1.PROC_INST_ID_ AS processInstanceId, t1.END_TIME_ as endTime, t3.FLOW_TYPE_ as flowType, case when t1.END_TIME_ is null then '待办' else '已办' end as 'status', t2.NAME_ as formName, t2.BUSINESS_KEY_ as businessKey FROM act_hi_taskinst t1 LEFT JOIN act_ru_extension_task t3 ON T1.ID_ = t3.TASK_ID_ and t1.PROC_INST_ID_ = t3.PROC_INST_ID_ LEFT JOIN act_hi_procinst t2 ON t3.PROC_INST_ID_ = t2.PROC_INST_ID_ WHERE t1.PROC_INST_ID_ = #{processInstanceId}
order by t1.END_TIME_

SELECT t1.ID_ AS id, t1.TASK_ID_ as taskId, t1.PROC_INST_ID_ as processInstanceId, t1.CREATE_TIME_ as startTime, t1.FROM_KEY_ as fromKey, t1.ASSIGNEE_ as assignee
FROM act_ru_extension_task t1 WHERE PROC_INST_ID_ = #{processInstanceId} and TASK_ID_ = #{taskId}

SELECT t1.TASK_DEF_KEY_ as taskDefinitionKey, t1.ASSIGNEE_ as assignee, t1.FROM_KEY_ as fromKey, t1.TASK_MAX_DAY_ as taskMaxDay, t1.CUSTOM_TASK_MAX_DAY_ as customTaskMaxDay, t1.FLOW_TYPE_ as flowType FROM act_ru_extension_task t1 WHERE PROC_INST_ID_ = #{processInstanceId} and TASK_DEF_KEY_ = #{taskDefinitionKey} order by CREATE_TIME_ desc limit 1
